name: Datu
text: Let us welcome our visitor with open arms! But be warned to stay within the walls of the village the forest is no place for a little girl.

name: Datu
text: The creature has stolen the tiara! Help us find the tiara back and we will give you a reward!

name: Datu
text: Is there anything you would like to know?.

name: Datu
opt_1: I am the Datu of this village
opt_2: It is somewhere inside the forest!
